channel.title: Need a ''restarter'' for java 6 update 7 >this player already logged in try 60<
channel.description:
hello, i had many good autorestarter, But many doesnt work.. all me files stand good at Classpath & PATH [code]@echo off
color 0a
cls
echo Voule Auto restart
"pskill" /t java
echo Restarting server
title 1
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
cls[/code]
ill god this one its works good but it dont autorestart and me server says somtimes [b]''this player already logged in try 60 sec[/b]
would you help me
